tit.e: Nishiyama-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in Somanouchi Town, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture)
Nishiyama-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in Somanouchi Town, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 西山古墳（にしやまこふん）は、奈良県天理市杣之内（そまのうち）町にある古墳で、国の史跡に指定されている。
sen.e: Nishiyama Tumulus is a tumulus in Somanouchi-cho Tenri City, Nara Prefecture, and designated as the state's historic site.
Nishiyama-kofun Tumulus is a tumulus in Somanouchi Town, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture, and designated as the national historic site.
Nishiyama-kofun Tumulus is a tumulus in Somanouchi Town, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture, and designated as the national historic site.

sen.j: 築造時期は古墳時代前期（4世紀）と見られており、同古墳が属する杣之内古墳群の中でも最も古い時期に造られた古墳である。
sen.e: It is thought that the construction time of the tumulus was in the early Kofun period (tumulus period) (the fourth century), and the tumulus was constructed in the oldest period among Somanouchi burial mounds that the tumulus belongs.

It is thought that the tumulus was constructed in the early Kofun period (tumulus period) (the fourth century), that is to say, it was the one of the oldest in Somanouchi-kofun Tumulus Cluster that the tumulus belongs to.

It is thought that the tumulus was constructed in the early Kofun period (tumulus period) (the fourth century), that is to say, it was the one of the oldest in Somanouchi-kofun Tumulus Cluster that the tumulus belongs to.

sen.j: 墳丘は前方部を西に向けた3段構築の前方後方墳である。
sen.e: The tumulus is Zenpo-koho (square front, square back) mound having three stage construction, whose square front facing west.
sen.cmt: 「3段構築」は定訳不明でしたので"three stage construction"としました。一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: The tumulus is a square front, square back mound with three stage construction, whose square front facing west.
The tumulus is a square front, square back mound with three stage construction, whose square front facing west.

sen.j: 全長183メートル、後円部の幅94メートル 高さ16メートル、前方部の幅72メートル。
sen.e: The tumulus has a total length of 183 meters, and includes the round back part 94 meters wide and 16 meters high, and the square front part 72 meters wide.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: The tumulus has a total length of 183 meters; the round back part is 94 meters wide and 16 meters high, and the square front part 72 meters wide.
sen.cmt: 原文の「後円部」は「後方部」を指すと思われますが、原文通り訳出しています。
sen.e: The tumulus has a total length of 183 meters; the round back part is 94 meters wide and 16 meters high, and the square front part 72 meters wide.

sen.j: これは全国にある前方後方墳の中でもっとも規模の大きいものである。
sen.e: This is the largest among the square front and square back mounds in the country.
This is the largest among the square front and square back mounds in the country.
This is the largest among the square front and square back mounds in the country.

sen.j: 墳丘は1段目のみが前方後方墳の形で、その上に前方後円墳がのっているというきわめて特異な形をしており、当初からこの形であったことは間違いないとみられている。
sen.e: The tumulus has an extremely peculiar shape, that is only the first stage of the mound has the square front and square back mound shape, and the keyhole-shaped mounds are placed on the first stage, and it is believed without a doubt that the tumulus has this shape from the beginning.

The tumulus has an extremely peculiar shape, that is only the first stage of the mound has the square front and square back mound shape, on which the keyhole-shaped mound is placed, and it is believed without a doubt that the tumulus has this shape from the beginning.

The tumulus has an extremely peculiar shape, that is only the first stage of the mound has the square front and square back mound shape, on which the keyhole-shaped mound is placed, and it is believed without a doubt that the tumulus has this shape from the beginning.

sen.j: 後方部中心には竪穴式石室があるが、すでに盗掘を受けているとみられている。
sen.e: The vertical style stone chamber is located at the center of the square back part, but it has seemed that the chamber has been already subjected to the grave robbing.
The vertical stone chamber is located at the center of the square back part, but it has seemed that the chamber has been already subjected to the grave robbing.
The vertical stone chamber is located at the center of the square back part, but it has seemed that the chamber has been already subjected to the grave robbing.

sen.j: 第2次世界大戦中には旧日本軍により対空砲の陣地がおかれ、このさいに竪穴式石室の石材（柏原市芝山産）が堀りだされたとされる。
sen.e: It is said that the antiaircraft artillery position was taken up by the old Japanese military during World War II, and the building stones (produced in Shibayama, Kashiwabara City) in the vertical style stone chamber were dug up at that time.

It is said that the antiaircraft artillery position was taken up by the former Japanese military during World War II, and the building stones (produced in Shibayama, Kashiwabara City) in the vertical stone chamber were dug up at that time.

It is said that the antiaircraft artillery position was taken up by the former Japanese military during World War II, and the building stones (produced in Shibayama, Kashiwabara City) in the vertical stone chamber were dug up at that time.

sen.j: 墳丘の保存状態は良く、樹木が生えていないため段築をはっきりと観察することができる。
sen.e: The tumulus is well preserved, and its stage construction can be clearly observed since trees are not grown.
The tumulus is well preserved, and its stage construction can be clearly observed since trees are not grown.
The tumulus is well preserved, and its stage construction can be clearly observed since trees are not grown.
About 20 minutes walk from Tenri Station.
About 20 minutes' walk from Tenri Station.
About 20 minutes' walk from Tenri Station.

sen.j: 天理参考館の南約500メートル、天理中学校すぐ北。
sen.e: About 500 meters south of Tenri University Sankokan Museum, and just north of Tenri junior high school.
About 500 meters south of Tenri University Sankokan Museum, and just north of Tenri junior high school.
About 500 meters south of Tenri University Sankokan Museum, and just north of Tenri junior high school.
